name: first
description: - Node.js is a **JavaScript runtime environment** (outside the browser). - Built using **V8 engine** + **C++** for additional server-side capabilities. - **Browser JS** has `window` & `document` objects;   **Node.js** removes them because they are not needed on the server. - Node.js adds extra server-side features like:   - File handling   - Cryptography   - Network operations
